mapper.insert: INSERT INTO festival(contentsno, adminno, fcateno, title, content, passwd, word, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, rdate) VALUES(contents_seq.nextval, #{adminno}, #{fcateno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{passwd}, #{word}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT contentsno, adminno, fcateno, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM festival ORDER BY contentsno DESC
SELECT contentsno, adminno, fcateno, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM festival WHERE fcateno = #{fcateno} ORDER BY contentsno DESC
SELECT contentsno, adminno, fcateno, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, map, youtube FROM festival WHERE contentsno = #{contentsno}
mapper.update: UPDATE festival SET map=#{map} WHERE contentsno=#{contentsno}
UPDATE festival SET youtube=#{youtube} WHERE contentsno=#{contentsno}
